channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kate Middleton, Princess of Wales, Has Completed her Chemotherapy for Cancer
item.description: In a video message, Catherine said, “Doing what I can to stay cancer free is now my focus.”

item.title: Kate Middleton, Princess of Wales, Has Completed her Chemotherapy for Cancer
item.description: In a video message, Catherine said, “Doing what I can to stay cancer free is now my focus.”

item.title: Polymarket likely to remain offshore for now despite ruling in favor of U.S. election betting
item.description: The predictions market Kalshi successfully sued the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, which might appeal the ruling.

item.title: ‘Sound of Freedom’ Shows an Anti-Trafficking Hero. Women Tell a Different Story.
item.description: Tim Ballard’s work on sex trafficking became the basis of the hit movie “Sound of Freedom.” But a series of women, in lawsuits and interviews, have ac...

item.title: Peter Nygard Sentenced to 11 Years in Prison for Sexual Assault
item.description: Mr. Nygard was convicted in Toronto of sexually assaulting four women in his company’s headquarters. He also faces trials in Montreal, Winnipeg and Ne...

item.title: Trump’s dollar dominance plan would make countries ditch the greenback, analyst says
item.description: “If the US were to impose prohibitive tariffs across the board, they would cause massive disruption to the global economic system.”

item.title: Peter Nygard Sentenced to 11 Years in Prison for Sexual Assault
item.description: Mr. Nygard was convicted in Toronto of sexually assaulting four women in his company’s headquarters. He also faces trials in Montreal, Winnipeg and Ne...

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Violence Grows in West Bank, in Parallel With War in Gaza
item.description: A shooting that killed three Israelis at a border crossing on Sunday highlighted the worsening unrest in the occupied territory.

item.title: Elon Musk could become the world’s first trillionaire by 2027, report says
item.description: That club could grow quickly over the next 10 years.

item.title: Patti Scialfa, Bruce Springsteen’s Wife, Reveals Cancer Diagnosis
item.description: Ms. Scialfa, 71, revealed she was diagnosed with blood cancer in 2018, which has curtailed her appearances onstage with the E Street Band.

item.title: Russian Forces Capture 2 Villages in Eastern Ukraine, Analysis Shows
item.description: Russia appears to be trying to cut off Ukrainian soldiers around the strategic city of Pokrovsk, a focal point of the war in recent months.

item.title: Gen Zers aspire to a career in finance—but on their own terms
item.description: A staggering number of new graduates say they prioritize making positive societal contributions through their work, according to the CFA Institute.

item.title: Europe’s ‘Reason for Being’ at Risk as Competitiveness Wanes, Report Warns
item.description: The European Union, facing a shrinking share of the global economy, needs to increase its spending by nearly $900 billion a year, according to a long-...

item.title: At Least 18 Killed in Airstrikes in Syria, State Media Reports
item.description: Syria blamed Israel for strikes that it said targeted military sites, in what appeared to be one of the deadliest attacks there in months. Israel decl...

item.title: Tesla posts 2024 high in China car sales last month, but is still losing share to rivals like BYD
item.description: Elon Musk claims a report that says Tesla's market share is declining in China is "silly" as his factory runs at full steam.
